achievements.title: Lemniscate Hypothesis
achievements.subtitle: Chapter 1 · 1 - 1
achievements.description: ∞ loop traced from r² = cos(2θ); mirrored spawn lanes cross twice. Early E glyphs surge with divisor scouts—tempo control is vital.

achievements.title: Collatz Cascade
achievements.subtitle: Chapter 1 · 1 - 2
achievements.description: Stepwise descent generated from the 3n + 1 map with teleport risers. Hit-count enemies appear on odd nodes; summon glyph soldiers to stall.

achievements.title: Riemann Helix
achievements.subtitle: Chapter 1 · 1 - 3
achievements.description: Logarithmic spiral with harmonic bulges keyed to ζ(s) zero estimates. Divisor elites flank wave bosses—Ω previews excel at splash slows.

achievements.title: Twin Prime Fork
achievements.subtitle: Chapter 1 · 1 - 4
achievements.description: Dual lattice rails linked by prime gaps; enemies swap lanes unpredictably. Prime counters demand rapid-fire towers—γ chaining resets their count.

achievements.title: Birch Flow
achievements.subtitle: Chapter 1 · 1 - 5
achievements.description: Cardioid river influenced by elliptic curve rank gradients. Reversal sentinels join late waves—δ soldiers can flip them to your side.

achievements.title: Apocrypha Loop
achievements.subtitle: Trial · Trial - 4
achievements.description: Hidden lemniscate mirrored through complex planes; portals bloom off-axis. Only reveals during total glyph alignment—expect mixed archetypes in waves.

achievements.title: Derivative Bloom
achievements.subtitle: Corollary · Corollary - 6
achievements.description: Petal loops bloom where f′(x) = 0 across mirrored cardioids and saddle petals. Flux bursts alternate with brittle shards—steady α lattices prevent overflow collapses.

achievements.title: Integral Cascade
achievements.subtitle: Corollary · Corollary - 7
achievements.description: Stepped integrator ramps descend in quantized slopes shaped by accumulated area. Energy leeches drift down ramps—δ summons keep Δ energy above zero.

achievements.title: Fibonacci Turnabout
achievements.subtitle: Corollary · Corollary - 8
achievements.description: Interleaved golden spirals shift radius on Fibonacci indices and teleport pads. Prime counters spawn on Fibonacci junctions—γ conductors reset their tally.

achievements.title: Euler Bridge
achievements.subtitle: Corollary · Corollary - 9
achievements.description: Bridge arcs obey planar graph constraints; parity lanes swap over Euler gaps. Divisors guard the bridges—β beams must stay coherent to pierce.

achievements.title: Modular Bloom
achievements.subtitle: Corollary · Corollary - 10
achievements.description: Modular roses rotate through residue-locked petals with congruence gate warps. Reversal sentinels invert on residue gates—δ rallies convert them mid-arc.

achievements.title: Shadow Integral
achievements.subtitle: Trial · Trial - 5
achievements.description: Phase-shifted archipelago of calculus islands hidden beneath modular petals. Resource siphons and reversal elites stack together—prepare universal counters.

achievements.title: Abel Cascade
achievements.subtitle: Lemma · Lemma - 11
achievements.description: Waterfall descent using commutator switches; river nodes invert projectile order, testing burst versus beam timing. Stub focus – finalize lemma-tier enemy pacing once behaviors are scripted.

achievements.title: Noether Weave
achievements.subtitle: Lemma · Lemma - 12
achievements.description: Symmetry-rich ringroads whose portals preserve DPS sums; enemies trade positions when struck by support glyphs. Stub focus – finalize lemma-tier enemy pacing once behaviors are scripted.

achievements.title: Erdős Drift
achievements.subtitle: Lemma · Lemma - 13
achievements.description: Random-graph tramlines that shuffle lane adjacency; probabilistic smugglers reroute toward the longest surviving enemy. Stub focus – finalize lemma-tier enemy pacing once behaviors are scripted.

achievements.title: Möbius Rind
achievements.subtitle: Lemma · Lemma - 14
achievements.description: Inside-out corkscrew track; sign-flip sentries grant negative armor that amplifies epsilon burn damage. Stub focus – finalize lemma-tier enemy pacing once behaviors are scripted.

achievements.title: Ramanujan Bloom
achievements.subtitle: Lemma · Lemma - 15
achievements.description: Lotus of nested circles keyed to modular forms; resonance echoes cause defeated foes to spawn low-HP harmonic clones. Stub focus – finalize lemma-tier enemy pacing once behaviors are scripted.

achievements.title: Hilbert Fold
achievements.subtitle: Proof · Proof - 16
achievements.description: Space-filling fractal corridor; dimensional walkers slip through walls unless slowed by delta caserns. Stub focus – stage goals will follow once proof-tier hazards are tuned.

achievements.title: Gödel Labyrinth
achievements.subtitle: Proof · Proof - 17
achievements.description: Self-referencing maze with locked axioms; paradox custodians revive unless struck by three distinct tower classes. Stub focus – stage goals will follow once proof-tier hazards are tuned.

achievements.title: Turing Spire
achievements.subtitle: Proof · Proof - 18
achievements.description: Vertical tape ascent with binary toggles; automaton foes flip between vulnerable and immune states based on attack parity. Stub focus – stage goals will follow once proof-tier hazards are tuned.

achievements.title: Cantor Verge
achievements.subtitle: Proof · Proof - 19
achievements.description: Fragmented coastline path removing middle thirds; lacuna spirits leap gaps, forcing chained knockback to corral them. Stub focus – stage goals will follow once proof-tier hazards are tuned.

achievements.title: Jordan Curve Bastion
achievements.subtitle: Proof · Proof - 20
achievements.description: Contour fortress wrapped around the core; enclosure judges stun towers that let enemies slip past twice. Stub focus – stage goals will follow once proof-tier hazards are tuned.

achievements.title: Gauss Orchard
achievements.subtitle: Theorem · Theorem - 21
achievements.description: Hexagonal orchard aligned to quadratic residues; orchard keepers gain bonus armor on perfect squares. Stub focus – theorem-tier balancing will be added alongside enemy rosters.

achievements.title: Fourier Aurora
achievements.subtitle: Theorem · Theorem - 22
achievements.description: Polar halo with wavelength lanes; harmonics build up unless projectile types stay varied. Stub focus – theorem-tier balancing will be added alongside enemy rosters.

achievements.subtitle: Theorem · Theorem - 24

achievements.title: Poincaré Bloom
achievements.subtitle: Theorem · Theorem - 25
achievements.description: Hypersphere cross-section with teleport seams; flarebitters detonate when they contact the seams. Stub focus – theorem-tier balancing will be added alongside enemy rosters.

achievements.title: Zorn Horizon

achievements.title: Löwenheim Gate

achievements.description: Quantifier gates that rescale enemy size; shrinking glyphs slip through gaps unless sigma snares hold them. Stub focus – axiom-tier encounters will be scripted once late-game math is locked.

achievements.subtitle: Axiom · Axiom - 28
achievements.description: Category lattice weaving incoming paths; functor heralds copy the highest-tier tower stats once per wave. Stub focus – axiom-tier encounters will be scripted once late-game math is locked.

achievements.subtitle: Axiom · Axiom - 29

achievements.subtitle: Axiom · Axiom - 30
achievements.description: Final spiral built from recursive integers; successor titans rebuild lost segments unless powderfall seals flare. Stub focus – axiom-tier encounters will be scripted once late-game math is locked.
